For some reason, I get the feeling that the massive Legion invasion that Shin senses follows the Republic getting at least partially overrun by Legion forces. This comes from
1.) the Republic hasn‚Äôt established radio contact with the Giad Federacy
2.) there is a large invasion incoming, and it wouldn‚Äôt really make sense if Giad was the only nation that the Legion attacked
2a.) They have already been shown (for an entire season) to be continually attacking the Republic, so this invasion would likely be directed there as well
2b.) The Legion probably wouldn‚Äôt attack two nations at the same time, as this would divert processing power between the two. Hence, I believe that the large-scale attack on the Republic has already occurred.
3.) Shin mentions that there are not many 86 left, so the 86 being totally overrun is not implausible.
Well, I guess I was slightly off (according to anime adaption, anyways), but I was somewhat close.
good speculation on your part but yeah like the other dude said the republic has already been attacked and most of it is in shambles. Don't worry lena is alive.
